amendment.description: At the end of the bill (before the short title), insert the following new section: SEC.___. The amount otherwise provided by title IX for "Overseas Contingency Operations Transfer Fund" is hereby reduced by $3,577,192,676.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to reduce by $3,577,192,676 the funding for the Overseas Contingency Operations Transfer Fund provided by title IX.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Flake amendment (A062) Failed by recorded vote: 118 - 295 (Roll no. 526).

action.text: House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Flake amendment (A062) Failed by recorded vote: 118 - 295 (Roll no. 526).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A062) offered by Mr. Flake.
